basic_information.committee_name: CMS - Mathematics and Statistics Scholarship Commi

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science pursuing a degree in the Department of Mathematics and Statistics with a focus in Mathematics Education. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Mathematics Education major Undergraduate student Female Junior or Senior status only Preparing to teach math in the public school system 3.0 GPA or above Demonstrate adequate progress towards completion of degree Two faculty letters of recommendation

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major is Mathematics Education
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major is Mathematics Education

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
